nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, an officer served at Alliance Base 16 on the planet Gaulus with her daughter. During an Imperial attack on the base, she was badly wounded and initially left to die by Commander Harles of Garrison Company 125a so that she would not be interrogated and then killed. However, she was then rescued by Harles after he allowed the woman's daughter to rig the base's power generator to blow.
